boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib

Class ConfigCircleRegularGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.abst.fiducial.calib.ConfigCircleRegularGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    boofcv.struct.Configuration, java.io.Serializable

    public class ConfigCircleRegularGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements boofcv.struct.Configuration
    Calibration parameters for a regular grid of circle calibration target.
    See Also:
    DetectCircleAsymmetricGrid, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • numRows

        public int numRows
        Number of black circles tall the grid is. Target dependent.

      • numCols

        public int numCols
        Number of black circles wide the grid is. Target dependent.

      • thresholding

        public boofcv.factory.filter.binary.ConfigThreshold thresholding
        Configuration for thresholding the image

      • ellipse

        public boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigEllipseDetector ellipse
        Configuration for the ellipse detector

      • centerDistance

        public double centerDistance
        Distance between each center's center along the x and y axis. Another way to look at this is that it is twice the distance of the center of each grid cell.

      • circleDiameter

        public double circleDiameter
        Diameter of each circle.

      • ellipseSizeSimilarity

        public double ellipseSizeSimilarity
        How similar two ellipses must be to be connected. 0 to 1.0. 1.0 = perfect match and 0.0 = infinite difference in size
